__e: Let me finish your nightmare, kid.
At least you get to wake up from your nightmare.
And I will not live it wondering if tomorrow is the day your nightmare finally takes her away for good.
And every time you open them, you find only the... the briefest peace before you realize that that nightmare is real.
And that man... He's gone, but... The nightmare's still there.
Just weeks later, I look back on that time not from memory, but from the pages of this book.
